name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: You’ve done well [color=#FF0000][i]WARRIOR![/i][/color] With this relic, our goal draws ever closer

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: Next, head towards [color=#1E90FF][i]Jotunheim[/i][/color] where you’ll find the next relic

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: It’s guarded by the powerful Ice Giant, [color=#a7a7a7]Ymir[/color]

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: I shall grant you my blessing, enhancing your magical capabilities

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: Now go forth and crush those who threaten [color=#00BFFF][i]Ragnarök![/i][/color]
